penis.transformationDescription:
Letting out an involuntary moan, [npc.name] [npc.verb(feel)] [npc.her] penis shifting into a new form, and [npc.sheIs] hit by a wave of overwhelming arousal as a thick sheath suddenly grows around the base of [npc.her] shaft. As [npc.she] [npc.verb(pant)] and [npc.verb(gasp)] for air, rows of fleshy little backwards-facing barbs press out all along [npc.her] shaft.
[npc.She] now [npc.has] a [style.boldPanther(panther-like penis)], [npc.materialDescriptor] [npc.penisFullDescription(true)].
[npc.She] [npc.has] [style.boldPanther([npc.ballsCount]#IF(npc.isInternalTesticles()) internal#ENDIF balls)], [npc.materialDescriptor] [npc.ballsFullDescription(true)], which produce [npc.cumColour(true)] [style.boldPanther(panther cum)].
